languages.text: {n}С каждой секундой отсутствие незваных гостей в ваших покоях становится все более очевидным. Наконец Соломон с обессиленным вздохом отпускает оружие и сокрушенно произносит:{/n} "Проклятье... Видимо, они мне почудились. Прости".

{n}With each passing second, the absence of any uninvited guests in your chambers becomes more and more evident. Finally, Solomorne puts his weapon down with an exhausted sigh and says brokenly,{/n} "Damn it... I must have imagined them. I'm sorry."
languages.original_text: {n}С каждой секундой отсутствие незваных гостей в ваших покоях становится все более очевидным. Наконец Соломон с обессиленным вздохом отпускает оружие и сокрушенно произносит:{/n} "Проклятье... Видимо, они мне почудились. Прости".

traits.locale_text: {n}With each passing second, the absence of any uninvited guests in your chambers becomes more and more obvious. Finally, Solomorne puts his weapon down with an exhausted sigh and says brokenly,{/n} "Damn it... I must have imagined them. I'm sorry."

{n}With each passing second, the absence of any uninvited guests in your chambers becomes more and more evident. Finally, Solomorne puts his weapon down with an exhausted sigh and says brokenly,{/n} "Damn it... I must have imagined them. I'm sorry."

languages.text: {n}Au bout de quelques instants, il devient évident qu'aucun intrus n'a pénétré dans vos quartiers. Solomorne finit par poser son arme en poussant un soupir d'épuisement et dit d'une voix éraillée :{/n} « Bon sang... Mon imagination doit me jouer des tours. Je suis désolé. »
languages.original_text: {n}With each passing second, the absence of any uninvited guests in your chambers becomes more and more evident. Finally, Solomorne puts his weapon down with an exhausted sigh and says brokenly,{/n} "Damn it... I must have imagined them. I'm sorry."

traits.locale_text: {n}Au bout de quelques instants, il devient évident qu'aucun intrus n'a pénétré dans vos quartiers. Solomorne finit par poser son arme en poussant un soupir d'épuisement et dit d'une voix éraillée :{/n} « Bon sang... Mon imagination doit me jouer des tours. Je suis désolé. »

languages.text: {n}時が経つにつれて、この部屋に招かれざる客などいないことが次第に明らかになっていった。やがてソロモーンは、疲れきったようにため息をつきながら武器を下ろし、かすれた声でつぶやく。{/n}「くそ…私の勘違いでした。すみません」
languages.original_text: {n}With each passing second, the absence of any uninvited guests in your chambers becomes more and more obvious. Finally, Solomorne puts his weapon down with an exhausted sigh and says brokenly,{/n} "Damn it... I must have imagined them. I'm sorry."

traits.locale_text: {n}時が経つにつれて、この部屋に招かれざる客などいないことが次第に明らかになっていった。やがてソロモーンは、疲れきったようにため息をつきながら武器を下ろし、かすれた声でつぶやく。{/n}「くそ…私の勘違いでした。すみません」

languages.text: {n}A cada segundo que pasa, la ausencia de visitantes indeseados en tus aposentos se vuelve más evidente. Al fin, Solomorne guarda su arma y, con voz dolida, se disculpa:{/n} «Maldita sea... me los debo de haber imaginado. Lo lamento».
languages.original_text: {n}With each passing second, the absence of any uninvited guests in your chambers becomes more and more evident. Finally, Solomorne puts his weapon down with an exhausted sigh and says brokenly,{/n} "Damn it... I must have imagined them. I'm sorry."

traits.locale_text: {n}A cada segundo que pasa, la ausencia de visitantes indeseados en tus aposentos se vuelve más evidente. Al fin, Solomorne guarda su arma y, con voz dolida, se disculpa:{/n} «Maldita sea... me los debo de haber imaginado. Lo lamento».

languages.text: {n}时间一分一秒流逝，真相越来越明显——你的房间里根本没有不速之客。到最后，索罗蒙放下武器，疲惫地叹了口气，断断续续地开了口。{/n}“真该死……肯定是我出现幻觉了，我很抱歉。”
languages.original_text: {n}With each passing second, the absence of any uninvited guests in your chambers becomes more and more evident. Finally, Solomorne puts his weapon down with an exhausted sigh and says brokenly,{/n} "Damn it... I must have imagined them. I'm sorry."

traits.locale_text: {n}时间一分一秒流逝，真相越来越明显——你的房间里根本没有不速之客。到最后，索罗蒙放下武器，疲惫地叹了口气，断断续续地开了口。{/n}“真该死……肯定是我出现幻觉了，我很抱歉。”

languages.text: {n}Her geçen saniyeyle odadaki davetsiz misafirlerin yokluğu daha da açık hâle geliyor. Sonunda Solomorne, bıkkınlıkla iç çekerek silahını bırakıyor ve bezgin bir ses tonuyla konuşuyor.{/n} "Kahretsin, rüyamda gördüm demek ki... Özür dilerim."
languages.original_text: {n}With each passing second, the absence of any uninvited guests in your chambers becomes more and more evident. Finally, Solomorne puts his weapon down with an exhausted sigh and says brokenly,{/n} "Damn it... I must have imagined them. I'm sorry."

traits.locale_text: {n}Her geçen saniyeyle odadaki davetsiz misafirlerin yokluğu daha da açık hâle geliyor. Sonunda Solomorne, bıkkınlıkla iç çekerek silahını bırakıyor ve bezgin bir ses tonuyla konuşuyor.{/n} "Kahretsin, rüyamda gördüm demek ki... Özür dilerim."

languages.text: {n}Mit jeder Sekunde, die vergeht, wird offensichtlicher, dass keine ungebetenen Gäste in deinen Gemächern sind. Schließlich legt Solomorne mit einem erschöpften Seufzer die Waffe weg und sagt mit gebrochener Stimme: {/n} "Verdammt ... Ich muss sie mir eingebildet haben. Tut mir leid."
languages.original_text: {n}With each passing second, the absence of any uninvited guests in your chambers becomes more and more evident. Finally, Solomorne puts his weapon down with an exhausted sigh and says brokenly,{/n} "Damn it... I must have imagined them. I'm sorry."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit jeder Sekunde, die vergeht, wird offensichtlicher, dass keine ungebetenen Gäste in deinen Gemächern sind. Schließlich legt Solomorne mit einem erschöpften Seufzer die Waffe weg und sagt mit gebrochener Stimme: {/n} "Verdammt ... Ich muss sie mir eingebildet haben. Tut mir leid."
